info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 12:43PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pondera, southeastern Glacier and north central Teton Counties through 130 PM MDT... At 1243 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Heart Butte, or 28 miles northwest of Choteau, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valier, Dupuyer, Pendroy and Bynum. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 342 and 351. Highway 89 between mile markers 51 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
